root.swedish: S: vad kan jag hjälpa dig med U: jag vill köpa en hund S: okej. kul. då ska jag fråga dig några frågor och så skall vi se om vi kan komma fram till vilken hund som passar dig. så första frågan. i vilken grad skall din hund vara träningsbar U: i hög grad S: ja. vilken grad skall din hund fälla U: låg grad S: i vilken grad ska din hund ha energi U: hög grad S: i vilken grad ska din hund skälla U: ganska lågt S: i vilken grad ska din hund vara beskyddande U: ganska lågt S: ah. då rekommenderar jag volpino italiano U: super
root.english: S: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog S: okay. nice. then I'll ask you a few questions and then we'll see if we can decide which dog that suits you. so first question. to what degree should your dog be trainable U: to a great extent S: yes. to what degree should your dog shed U: low degree S: to what degree should your dog have energy U: high degree S: to what degree should your dog bark U: quite low S: to what degree should your dog be protective U: quite low S: ah. then I recommend volpino italiano U: great
root.distillation: S: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog S: okay. nice. then I'll ask you a few questions and then we'll see if we can decide which dog that suits you. so first question. to what degree should your dog be trainable U: to a great extent S: yes. to what degree should your dog shed U: low degree S: to what degree should your dog have energy U: high degree S: to what degree should your dog bark U: quite low S: to what degree should your dog be protective U: quite low S: ah. then I recommend a volpino italiano U: great
root.final: S: What can I help you with? U: I want to buy a dog S: okay. then I'll ask you a few questions and then we'll see if we can decide which dog that suits you. so first question. to what degree should your dog be trainable U: to a great extent S: yes. to what degree should your dog shed U: low degree S: to what degree should your dog have energy U: high degree S: to what degree should your dog bark U: quite low S: to what degree should your dog be protective U: quite low S: then I recommend a volpino italiano U: great
